body_html: I believe this is working as intended. I don't see a compelling reason to add relative paths to sys.path or that it is supported by Python. If you want to make it agile to being moved around, just make a shell script to wrap python that sets up PYTHONPATH before it invokes python.
body_text: I believe this is working as intended. I don't see a compelling reason to add relative paths to sys.path or that it is supported by Python. If you want to make it agile to being moved around, just make a shell script to wrap python that sets up PYTHONPATH before it invokes python.
body: I believe this is working as intended. I don't see a compelling reason to add relative paths to sys.path or that it is supported by Python. If you want to make it agile to being moved around, just make a shell script to wrap python that sets up PYTHONPATH before it invokes python.
